actions.name: Crackling Fury
actions.description:
Trigger: The user declares an attack.
Effect: Connection - Plasma Fists. The triggering attack has its Power increase by 40%, and it gains [Recoil 1/6] until the end of the user's Activation. When the user meets the Desperation Conditon, this bonus increases to 70%.
